actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a two-thirds vote on any bill or joint resolution that, pursuant to fast-track procedures, would implement any trade agreement.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI (On Bills) of the House of Representatives to require a vote of at least two-thirds of the Members voting before considering as passed any bill or joint resolution that implements any trade agreement and that is not subject to amendment.

titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a two-thirds vote on any bill or joint resolution that, pursuant to fast-track procedures, would implement any trade agreement.
